snippet.title: Glaciered - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
65 million years in the future, the "Everwinter" has transformed the Earth's surface into a gigantic sheet of ice and life continues to survive under the glacier-covered seas. Play as a Tuai—a species that evolved from birds—and fight against that which has come to threaten the Everwinter.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2052300

The futuristic underwater action game Glaciered is scheduled to release in 2025.
Please wishlist the game and look forward to updates!

This trailer features the protagonist Gray, who was born as one of the winged ones—the Tuai—and soon given a mission that will determine the fate of their entire species. They fight bravely against numerous foes and encounters a never-before-seen enemy that emerges from the darkness with an ominous noise...

Glaciered will be fully voiced, and this trailer features the Japanese voiceovers by Tatsunori Fukusato (Gray) and Asuka Itou (The Seeker) for the very first time.

A playable demo of the game will be showcased at Tokyo Game Show 2024 (Sep 26-29) at the PLAYISM booth. Please stop by to try it out!

▶ Developer: Studio Snowblind (https://glaciered.com/)
▶ Publisher: PLAYISM (https://playism.com/game/glaciered/)

© Studio Snowblind All rights reserved. Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.
